name: A Forum Styles
description: For NYTRMG (now Halifax) local News sites and local forums thereof (Press Democrat, Sarasota Herald Tribune, <strike>Blue Ridge News (Hendersonville Times News)</strike>, Tuscaloosa News, <strike>Gainesville Sun and Ocala Star Banner</strike>); intended to be used with style 62377.
additional_info:
02.01.2013: A few tweaks ... very minor.

11.20.2012: Small update for the forums that are left.

08.3.2012: Small update to the forums to correct a small error when one is not logged in.

06.21.2012: Updated the background url. Thanks, user 136304! :)

05.25.2012: Edited for the Sarasota Prep Sports section.

05.06.2012: Various color and header fixes. Re-wrote the CSS affecting the MugShot pages.

05.05.2012: Edited to allow scrolling when the poll results exceed the size of the poll display compartment (iframe) on the news sites relevant to the Style.

04.20.2012: Edited once again ... my ABP settings were messing with article FB comments ... fixed. Also fixed the default display of multiple descriptive lines on the initial News page for the photo galleries (now one can read the entire description without it being cut off at the bottom). Lots of other fixes and tweaks for the News sites. :)

04.18.2012: <strike> Updated Facebook Comments at the bottom of articles (without the this Style, one can only see them partially) ... I have a feeling they'll be changing them again soon and I'll re-update accordingly. However, currently, the comments are now scrollable, at least.</strike>

04.16.2012: Updated for those not using ABP.

04.15.2012: Forums updated with opacity changes (more transparency).

04.14.2012: Many updates as <strike>, apparently, FB comment display (I made it scrollable) and </strike> various items have changed recently on the news sites. Also an update thanks to user 136304 (thanks! :) ).

04.11.2012: Updated to include more sections of the NYTRMG (now Halifax) local news sites:
Press Democrat, Sarasota Herald Tribune, Blue Ridge News (Hendersonville Times News), Tuscaloosa News, Gainesville Sun and Ocala Star Banner

Updated with inspiration from user 136304 (more transparency) :)

Note: The header pic is not in the Style - see style 62377
